TopicTitle: What Kind of Thread Goes Where?

Articles.Content:
Hello, lately I have been active on the forums but have yet to find anything saying what kind of thread goes where and I am a little confused for example, I'm not sure if this goes in the General Disscusion of Support toppic.Thanks in advance.

-Sarge

Self explanatory. off topic is where off topic stuff goes. General is where KSP stuff goes. Fanwork is well, Were fanwork goes. You can report bugs and ideas in the developement/bug report area. Explore. Thats how I learned it. I stayed on general for a while.

It says under the forum name what goes where.

Like:

General Discussion(110 Viewing)

Anything and everything about Kerbal Space Program.

or

General Add-on Affairs(6 Viewing)

A General Discussion Place for Talk of All User-Made Things
Ok I understand now thanks guys!
